Ethnic Hilltribe Eco Trails - 1 Day Doi Luang

Hike to the 3rd highest point in Thailand.

This tour is currently unavailable

Quick Facts

Price: Starting from THB 6000
Duration: 12 hours
Meal(s): Lunch
Difficulty: Difficult- Experienced/fit levels
Seasonal: November to February

More Info

Pick Up & Drop Off

Pick up from your hotel between 5.30 - 6.00 am. Drop off in Chiang Mai around 20.00

Included

Pick up & drop off from your hotel, lunch, water, English-speaking guide, park fees and insurance.

Not Included

Extra snacks or soft drinks.

What to Bring

Wear shoes with grip suitable for trekking, and pack a warm layer, mornings can be chilly in cool season, mosquito spray and money for personal use.

Please support our mission by booking your trek directly with us on this site or by calling us instead of through a tour agency.

Highlights

  • 8 Hour hike
  • Enjoy tropical flora and fauna along your walk - learn about how plants are used in traditional medicines and edible plants and fruits from your guide
  • Summit the 3rd highest mountain in Thailand

Itinerary:

  • Pick up 5.30 to 6.00 am from your hotel.
  • Drive 2 hours to Doi Luang National Park
  • Arrive at starting point of the trail and begin preparation for hike to the summit
  • We will hike around 4 to 5 hours hours to the peak. Along the trail you can enjoy the incredibly scenic mountain views, fauna and flora.
  • Once we summit we will prepare our packed lunch and enjoy our lunch on top of the 3rd highest mountain in Thailand.
  • After Lunch we will begin our decent back down the mountain 4 hours till we reach the end.
  • Depart for Chiang Mai arriving at about 8 pm.

Trip Images

Practicing sustainable tourism and supporting family run businesses
